comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Captain James Clayton Barr of the SS Carmania. It was the first ship to arrive to rescue the SS Volturno. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SS_Volturno_(1906) [http://www.flickr.com/photos/4737carlin/4036629483/]

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for pointing out his correct name.  We'll fix the source data next time we update.
